title: Immunity Boosters Tour
description: Discover powerful herbs that strengthen your immune system and protect against infections.

steps.narrationText: Begin your immunity journey with Tulsi, the Queen of Herbs. This sacred plant has been protecting Indian households for millennia with its powerful immunomodulatory properties.
Next, we visit Amla, nature's richest source of Vitamin C. One small fruit contains more vitamin C than an orange, making it a powerhouse for immunity.
Meet Neem, the village pharmacy. Its powerful antibacterial and antiviral properties make it essential for maintaining a strong immune defense.
Complete your tour with Ginger, a warming root that boosts circulation and enhances your body's natural defenses.

title: Digestive Health Tour
description: Explore herbs that support healthy digestion, reduce bloating, and improve gut health.

steps.narrationText: Start with Ginger, the ultimate digestive aid. Its warming properties stimulate digestive fire and reduce nausea and bloating.
Discover Turmeric, the golden healer. It soothes inflammation in the gut and supports healthy digestion.
Visit Aloe Vera, nature's gentle laxative. Its cooling gel soothes the digestive tract and promotes regularity.
Conclude with Amla, which enhances digestive enzyme activity and supports overall gut health.

title: Stress Relief & Mental Clarity Tour
description: Journey through adaptogenic herbs that calm the mind, reduce stress, and enhance mental clarity.

steps.narrationText: Begin with Ashwagandha, the king of adaptogens. This powerful root helps your body adapt to stress and promotes a sense of calm.
Move to Brahmi, the brain tonic. This herb calms anxiety while simultaneously sharpening focus and memory.
Experience Tulsi's stress-relieving properties. Regular consumption helps reduce cortisol levels and brings mental clarity.

title: Radiant Skin Tour
description: Learn about herbs that promote glowing skin, heal wounds, and treat skin conditions naturally.

steps.narrationText: Start with Neem, nature's purifier. Its antibacterial properties make it perfect for treating acne and skin infections.
Discover Turmeric's beauty secrets. This golden spice has been used for centuries to brighten skin and reduce inflammation.
Meet Aloe Vera, the skin soother. Its cooling gel hydrates, heals wounds, and rejuvenates skin naturally.
